« 5:10 Lingfield (AW) WEDNESDAY, 27 FEBRUARY 2013

  • Print outs

TBA Mares´ Intermediate Open National Hunt Flat Race (All-Weather) (CLASS 6) (4-6yo)

  • Runners: 18
  • Distance: 2m
  • Going: Standard
  • Channel: ATR

£2,400 guaranteed For 4-6yo which have not run under any recognised Rules of Racing, except NH/INH Flat races or French AQPS Flat races Weights 4yo 10st 5lb; 5-6yo 11st Penalties a winner of a race 7lb; of two races 10lb; of three races 14lb pay £ 12
